name: Digit Mart
description: AI-Powered Autonomous Checkout. Our modern AI-powered computer vision platform enables autonomous checkout for brick-and-mortar retailers.

name: Digit Kart
description: Touchless checkout. Checkout without touching anything. Our advanced technology can identify multiple items in less than a second, allowing your customers to scan, pay, and be on their way.

name: Digit Robo
description: Drone Inventory Management. Enhance your inventory visibility and planning with predictive technology. Using ERP data, a single-view dashboard is created allowing you to focus on the most important items.

name: Digit Square
description: Content and Language Annotation solution. This solution. is an end-to-end SaaS based platform for annotating, training, and automating the computer vision pipeline.
